# Using Anaconda

Our objective is to use the `Anaconda Power Shell` prompt.

1. Search for `Anaconda Powershell Prompt`

2. Select `run as administrator`

3. Run the command `conda update conda`

4. Run `conda update --all` followed by `yes`, `yes`.
